name: Gakuen Club
description: Gakuen Club is a school life love story that begins when you discover a secret at your academy, setting off a chain of events that you never imagined. Enjoy the different distinct and unique characters along with their own stories and wonderful voices.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 Processor: Pentium 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1.5 GB available space Additional Notes: Resolution: 1280x720
